reference.title: Domains and constraints in the OASIS specification
reference.shortdesc: OASIS distributes grammar files for a set of domains and constraints.

section.p: A designation of (map) after the domain name indicates that the domain only specializes map elements; a designation of (topic) indicates that the domain specializes elements that are only available in topic or that it can only be used in topics. A designation of (map/topic) indicates that the domain specializes elements that are common to both maps and topics, so could be used in either even if it is generally intended for one or the other. Attribute domains can always be used in both topics and maps.
